short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that allows you to interact with webpages and the browser using your voice and talon or your keyboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rango is an extension that helps you interact with web pages using your voice and talon. It does this by drawing hints with letters next to elements that you can use to click, hover, copy or show link addresses and more. It also helps you to close tabs, open a link in a new tab and open multiple link in new tabs without focusing them.
